snippet: Mr. Collins became a familiar face in American living rooms in the 1980s as the congenial host of the syndicated afternoon talk show “Hour Magazine,” for which he won an Emmy.
abstract: Gary Collins, actor and Miss America pageant host, dies at age 74.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Collins became a familiar face in American living rooms in the 1980s as the congenial host of the syndicated afternoon talk show “Hour Magazine,” for which he won an Emmy.

headline.seo: Gary Collins, Host of Miss America Pageant, Dies at 74
headline.main: Gary Collins, Host of Miss America Pageant, Dies at 74
